mapper.select: select count(*) from cart where member_id = #{memberId}

select cart.*, product.product_name, product.product_unit, product.product_price, product.product_file, product.product_sold_out from cart inner join product on cart.product_code = product.product_code where cart.member_id = #{memberId};

select cart.*, product.product_name, product.product_unit, product.product_price, product.product_file, product.product_sold_out from cart inner join product on cart.product_code = product.product_code where cart.member_id = #{memberId} and cart.product_code = #{productCode};
select sum(cart.quantity * product.product_price) from cart inner join product on cart.product_code = product.product_code where cart.member_id = #{memberId} and not product.product_sold_out = 1;
mapper.delete: delete from cart where member_id = #{memberId} and product_code = #{productCode}
mapper.update: update cart set quantity = #{quantity} where member_id = #{memberId} and product_code = #{productCode}
update cart set product_grinding = #{productGrinding} where member_id = #{memberId} and product_code = #{productCode}
